title: MBMBaM 469: Face 2 Face: The DEEP Pepperoni
description: We’re heading back from book tour, making this the perfect time for us to deploy our recent live show from lovely, soggy Indianapolis. Join us for discussions on Real Life Vape Dads, and see Justin and Travis fuse into a hive mind while discussing practical pepperoni applications.
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
